songs.title: Rap Hard (Intro)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
Hello ladies and gentlemen, this is (Kid Mescudi) right here to present to you the new album Rap Hard on the new label, Midwest motherfuckin’ Action. Y’all know how we do it, and me and my partner (Melwisky), we got this hot shit for you and we gon’ give it to you. Alright? So, you know, I been working on this album for a span of a year and a half and I hope you all get out of it of what I put into it. (If not, I don’t give a fuck.) So without further ado, let’s get it right into this shit. Holla at me, Midwest Action. Let’s go.
